name: CRDA Approved Open Plots at Amaravathi – MyProperty.Homes
description: Explore CRDA-approved open plots and ventures in Amaravathi Capital Region. Premium layouts with 40 ft CC roads, drainage, park, and bank loan options. Developed by trusted builders and promoted by MyProperty.Homes.

acceptedAnswer.text: Amaravathi is the capital region of Andhra Pradesh, located between Vijayawada and Guntur, developed under the CRDA zone.
Yes, all open plots promoted by MyProperty.Homes in Amaravathi are CRDA-approved with clear title and layout approvals.
Each layout includes 40 ft CC roads, underground drainage, parks, avenue plantation, and street lighting.

mainEntity.name: What is the starting price of open plots?

acceptedAnswer.text: The open plots in Amaravathi start from ₹15,000 per sq. yd onwards, depending on location and layout size.
Nearby landmarks include Amaravathi Secretariat, VIT-AP University, SRM University, and the upcoming capital zone developments.
